solution_line_template: Each part of the wire is {total_wire_length}/{num_parts} = <<{total_wire_length}/{num_parts}={length_per_part}>>{length_per_part} meters long.
Ernest used {parts_used} parts, then he used {length_per_part} x {parts_used} = <<{parts_used}*{length_per_part}={wire_used}>>{wire_used} meters of the wire.
Therefore, {total_wire_length} - {wire_used} = <<{total_wire_length}-{wire_used}={wire_not_used}>>{wire_not_used} meters of wire is not used.
